title: REFCARD
summary: REFCARD is actualy a prototype you can use on smartwatches
description: REFCARD is actualy a prototype you can use on a smartwatch. Please us it carefully.REFCARD prototype can be used for football referees (11vs11). Once the smartwatch equiped, the app allow to not use a referee sheet. You can consider it as a substitute. The application includes the main the following functions :   - Chronometer (account and deduct)   - Cardiac sensor   - Step counter   - Score display   - Sanctions display (staff exclusion, cards etc...)   - Replacements displayWe are still in the trial stage. So your returns and experiments are very important for us. Thank you for using REFCARD.
descriptionHTML:
REFCARD is actualy a prototype you can use on a smartwatch. Please us it carefully.

REFCARD prototype can be used for football referees (11vs11). Once the smartwatch equiped, the app allow to not use a referee sheet. You can consider it as a substitute.

The application includes the main the following functions :

- Chronometer (account and deduct)
- Cardiac sensor
- Step counter
- Score display
- Sanctions display (staff exclusion, cards etc...)
- Replacements display

We are still in the trial stage. So your returns and experiments are very important for us. Thank you for using REFCARD.
